title: Russia says U.S. adding fuel to the fire by supplying rockets to Ukraine; fighting rages in Donbas
content:
1. Russia says U.S. adding fuel to the fire by supplying rockets to Ukraine; fighting rages in Donbas  CNBC
  2. Biden approves sending advanced rocket systems to Ukraine, walking 'very fine line' with Russians: expert  Fox News
  3. US will not send long-range rockets for Ukraine to hit Russia, according to Biden  CNN
  4. Live updates | Portugal sends marines to NATO in Lithuania  The Washington Post
  5. U.S. to discuss new security assistance for Ukraine 'before too long' -State Dept  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: ロシア、米国がウクライナにロケット弾を供給し火に油を注いでいると指摘 ドンバスで戦闘が勃発
俄罗斯称美国向乌克兰提供火箭弹是火上浇油；顿巴斯地区战火不断
俄羅斯稱美國向烏克蘭提供火箭彈是火上澆油；頓巴斯地區戰火不斷
